title: Why the Quality of Academic Teaching is Becoming so important?

author: Barica Marentič Požarnik, Faculty of Arts, University of Ljubljana

segmentation: Ladies and gentlemen, I am very grateful to a professor at season two had invited me here because I had now two wonderful days to feel the atmosphere to get very many new ideas.
And now I am going to try to share you my experiences and my questions on the topic of improving University teaching.
Through teaching teachers, these are my experiences in my interest.
Why is the quality of teacher getting so important?
I won't speak much about it because it has been already said, but teaching today is more demanding, much more demanding than it was before.
There are so many students, very many different students.
We see this rapid development of science, technology, digital technology and especially new competences which were already mentioned.
Systemic creative critical thinking.
Responsibility for ethical sustainable development of society.
We should not forget about the ethical dimension of University teaching and this of course doesn't come just by.
Lectoring it has to be different.
The saying of this American pedagogue that you certainly know.
Was is old, but is also valid for today.
If we teach today as we thought yesterday, we Rob our children of tomorrow and that's getting more and more.
University teacher has very many different things to do.
A special research teaching management.
Also cooperation with different enterprises etc etc.
It's a very busy and difficult role.
Now I would like you to think a little bit about two roles.
Once research one is teaching and think a little bit.
What do you think when you compare?
And I would just like that you raise your hands.
Regarding importance, is research more equally or less important then?
Teaching how many of you think that research is more important than teaching in University business?

How many you think that teaching is more important than?

I would.

Research because the knowledge is renewing, no.
Yeah, of course research.
Research is extremely important is the question will just for your career when you want to come a little one stop higher and higher?
Are they equally important?
Research and teaching?
Very important first first.
In our University also so where we want.
Discussed is longer, but yes.
Any teaching needs research on their process of teaching learning.
Yeah, of course.

Yeah, of course.
These to do research.
Yeah, improve.

Learning Yahoo.
Make sure the learning objectives are being really there for.
Weather research is important or role.
I think there is a need to define what do we mean by research.
Thank you.

But then the last question for which field does University to receive more training methodology of research or how to teach so?
